law.catch_line: Effective date -- Application to business trusts -- Application to foreign business trusts.

text.section: This chapter does not limit, prohibit, or invalidate the existence, acts, or obligations of any common-law trust created or doing business in this Commonwealth before, on, or after July 12, 2012.

A business trust formed under any statute of this Commonwealth prior to July 12, 2012, until or unless it becomes a statutory trust under this chapter, shall continue to be governed by the provisions of the statute under which it was formed.
The enactment of this chapter shall not impair, or otherwise affect, the organization or the continued existence of a business trust existing on July 12, 2012.

This chapter governs only:
A statutory trust formed on or after July 12, 2012; and
A business trust formed before July 12, 2012, which elects, in the manner provided in its governing instrument or by law for amending the governing instrument, to be subject to this chapter.
An election pursuant to subsection (5) or (6) of this section is effective upon the effective time and date of the amended and restated certificate of trust as provided in KRS 14A.2-070.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 76, effective July 12, 2012.
